title.rendered: “Overnight IDF Operation: 10 Arrests, Multiple Weapons Seized Across Judea and Samaria”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF, SHABAK and MAGAV soldiers worked overnight to arrest ten wanted individuals across Judea and Samaria and confiscated multiple weapons.

IDF, SHABAK and MAGAV soldiers arrested ten wanted individuals overnight across Judea and Samaria, including two associated with the terror organization Hamas.

During an operation in a small village in the Binyamin battalion, two wanted individuals were arrested and suspects were investigated.

In Beit Iba in the Samaria brigade, the forces located and confiscated weapons. Also, in Bnei Naim in the Judea brigade, the soldiers located and seized additional weapons. During the forces’ activities in the city of Hebron in the Judea brigade, the forces seized terror funds.

The arrested individuals and the detained weaponry have been handed over for further handling by the security forces. Our forces have not suffered any casualties.

Since the beginning of the war, over 2,550 wanted individuals have been arrested across the Judea and Samaria division, and the Jordan Valley and Valleys brigade, about 1,300 of whom are associated with the Hamas terror organization.

Attached are pictures of the confiscated weapons: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC010120239729753920.
